verses.verse: Likewise, <S%G3668><s%> you wives, <S%G1135><s%> be in subjection <S%G5293><s%> to your <S%G3588><s%> own <S%G2398><s%> husbands; <S%G435><s%> that, if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> obey <S%G544><s%> not the word, <S%G3056><s%> they also <S%G2532><s%> may without <S%G427><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> be won <S%G2770><s%> by the conversation <S%G391><s%> of the wives; <S%G1135><s%>
While they behold <S%G2029><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> chaste <S%G53><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%> coupled with fear. <S%G5401><s%>

For after <S%G3779><s%> this <S%G3779><s%> manner <S%G3779><s%> in the old <S%G4218><s%> time <S%G4218><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> trusted <S%G1679><s%> in God, <S%G2316><s%> adorned <S%G2885><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> being in subjection <S%G5293><s%> to their own <S%G2398><s%> husbands: <S%G435><s%>

Even <S%G5613><s%> as Sara <S%G4564><s%> obeyed <S%G5219><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> calling <S%G2564><s%> him lord: <S%G2962><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> daughters <S%G5043><s%> you are, as long as you do <S%G15><s%> well, <S%G15><s%> and are not afraid <S%G5399><s%> with any <S%G1536><s%> amazement. <S%G4423><s%>

Likewise, <S%G3664><s%> you husbands, <S%G435><s%> dwell <S%G4924><s%> with them according <S%G2596><s%> to knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> giving <S%G632><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> to the wife, <S%G1134><s%> as to the weaker <S%G772><s%> vessel, <S%G4632><s%> and as being heirs <S%G4789><s%> together <S%G4789><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of life; <S%G2222><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%> be not hindered. <S%G1581><s%>

Finally, <S%G5056><s%> be you all <S%G3956><s%> of one <S%G3675><s%> mind, <S%G3675><s%> having compassion <S%G4835><s%> one of another, <S%G4835><s%> love <S%G5361><s%> as brothers, <S%G5361><s%> be pitiful, <S%G2155><s%> be courteous: <S%G5391><s%>

Not rendering <S%G591><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> for evil, <S%G2556><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> railing <S%G3059><s%> for railing: <S%G3059><s%> but contrariwise <S%G5121><s%> blessing; <S%G2129><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that you are thereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> called, <S%G2564><s%> that you should inherit <S%G2816><s%> a blessing. <S%G2129><s%>

For he that will <S%G2309><s%> love <S%G25><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and see <S%G1492><s%> good <S%G18><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> let him refrain <S%G3973><s%> his tongue <S%G1100><s%> from evil, <S%G2556><s%> and his lips <S%G5491><s%> that they speak <S%G2980><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> guile: <S%G1388><s%>
Let him eschew <S%G1578><s%> evil, <S%G2556><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> good; <S%G18><s%> let him seek <S%G2212><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> and ensue <S%G1377><s%> it.

For the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> are over <S%G1909><s%> the righteous, <S%G1342><s%> and his ears <S%G3775><s%> are open to their prayers: <S%G1162><s%> but the face <S%G4383><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is against <S%G1909><s%> them that do <S%G4160><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%>
And who <S%G5101><s%> is he that will harm <S%G2559><s%> you, if <S%G1437><s%> you be followers <S%G3402><s%> of that which is good? <S%G18><s%>

But and if you suffer <S%G3958><s%> for righteousness' <S%G1343><s%> sake, happy <S%G3107><s%> are you: and be not afraid <S%G5399><s%> of their terror, <S%G5401><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> be troubled; <S%G5015><s%>

But sanctify <S%G37><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> hearts: <S%G2588><s%> and be ready <S%G2092><s%> always <S%G104><s%> to give an answer <S%G627><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man that asks <S%G154><s%> you a reason <S%G3056><s%> of the hope <S%G1680><s%> that is in you with meekness <S%G4240><s%> and fear: <S%G5401><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> conscience; <S%G4893><s%> that, whereas <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3759><s%> they speak <S%G2635><s%> evil <S%G2635><s%> of you, as of evildoers, <S%G2555><s%> they may be ashamed <S%G2617><s%> that falsely accuse <S%G1908><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> good <S%G18><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%> in Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For it is better, <S%G2909><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> be so, that you suffer <S%G3958><s%> for well <S%G15><s%> doing, <S%G15><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for evil <S%G2554><s%> doing. <S%G2554><s%>

For Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> has once <S%G530><s%> suffered <S%G3958><s%> for sins, <S%G266><s%> the just <S%G1342><s%> for the unjust, <S%G94><s%> that he might bring <S%G4317><s%> us to God, <S%G2316><s%> being put <S%G2289><s%> to death <S%G2289><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but quickened <S%G2227><s%> by the Spirit: <S%G4151><s%>

Which sometime <S%G4218><s%> were disobedient, <S%G544><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> once <S%G530><s%> the long-suffering <S%G3115><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> waited <S%G1551><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of Noah, <S%G3575><s%> while the ark <S%G2787><s%> was a preparing, <S%G2680><s%> wherein <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3757><s%> few, <S%G3641><s%> that is, eight <S%G3638><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> were saved <S%G1295><s%> by water. <S%G5204><s%>
